mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REVIEW (RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE) VALUES (SEQ_RV_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{pdt_num}, #{rv_content}, #{rv_score})
mapper.select: SELECT RN, RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE, RV_DATE_REG FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_REVIEW PK_RV_NUM)*/ ROWNUM RN, RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE, RV_DATE_REG FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE PDT_NUM = #{pdt_num} AND ROWNUM <= (#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount})) WHERE RN > ((#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount})
